SEARCH

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
Manages user accounts including creation, deletion, update, authentication, and persistent storage to a CSV file. Supports user types such as Scientist, Administrator, and SpaceAgentRep. Provides functionality for salting, hashing passwords, and verifying login credentials. Also acts as a factory for loading users from a CSV file and saving them back.

    Constructs a UserManager with the specified CSV file path and loads existing users.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserManager

      public UserManager(String filePath)
      Constructs a UserManager with the specified CSV file path and loads existing users.
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to the CSV file containing user records

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the system and saves it to the CSV file. If the user already exists, it prints an error and does not overwrite.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object to add

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user by username. If the user exists, they are removed and changes are saved.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to delete

    • updateUserFlexible

      public void updateUserFlexible(String oldUsername, String newUsername, String newPassword)
      Updates a user’s username and/or password. If the password is "[KEEP_OLD_PASSWORD]", the current password is retained.
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - the existing username
      newUsername - the new username to set
      newPassword - the new password to set or "[KEEP_OLD_PASSWORD]" to retain the current one

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String username)
      Retrieves a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the User object, or null if not found

    • getAllUsers

      public Collection<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all user objects in the system.
      Returns:
      a Collection of all users

    • generateSalt

      public String generateSalt()
      Generates a new cryptographically secure random salt encoded in Base64.
      Returns:
      the generated salt string

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String password, String salt)
      Hashes a password using SHA-256 and a salt.
      Parameters:
      password - the plaintext password
      salt - the salt to prepend to the password
      Returns:
      the Base64-encoded hashed password

    • authenticateUser

      public boolean authenticateUser(String username, String password, String role)
      Authenticates a user by comparing hashed credentials and checking the user role.
      Parameters:
      username - the entered username
      password - the entered plaintext password
      role - the expected role of the user
      Returns:
      true if credentials and role match; false otherwise
